title: Chris Bagley Walk - Pontesbury - Longden - Habberley Route

description: This long distance circular walk explores the area around the Shropshire village of Pontesbury. The waymarked trail will take you through attractive countryside and woodland with some excellent views from the hill tops. It runs for about 10 miles and was created in memory of Chris Bagley who inspired the regeneration of the local rights of way network. On the way you will pass the village of Longden and Habberley with the option of taking a detour to climb to the viewpoint on Pontesford Hill .
